title: your game is unplayable
body:
either you have shit matchups because of op champs
either you ahve shit matchmaknig with huge team disparancy
either some1 crashes during champ select or queue or some1 cant join
either you get in the game with 250 ping for absolute no reason
either youre vs a 3-4 man premades that ruin the game experience for all the others

replies.body:
Then dont play

Me on the other hand learn about match up and how to play so I wont bitchh on how OP something is or just ban that champ only {{champion:157}}

lately i've been banning lux, because, although I don't have any direct evidence, since I stopped frequenting the cheat message boards _(cuz it's like being a diabetic in a candy store) _

I highly suspect that the current fad is Lux scripts. Don't ask me to explain why, it's more of a gift, like ESPN.


Although the lux play rate over all is 10.76%, so there may be legit reasons, but it also couold indicate I'm right.

hope this helps!
